poem:
### Blue Echoes

In the land of azure kin,  
where floppy hats dance lightly—  
Rihanna hums dispassionate tunes,  
a modern Smurfette lost.  

Amid muted songs,  
content drips like rain on stone,  
each droplet speaking  
of disquiet, longing  
for vibrant cadences,  
for music unseen—  
a world beyond their reach,  
eluding even the smallest blue dreams.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Smurfs review – Rihanna is star turn of the new generation of floppy-hatted blue elves The star vocal turn of the very moderate new Smurfs film is Rihanna, phoning in an undemanding audio contribution as the female character named “Smurfette”. But there is little to no music in this laborious slice of content, one of the many frustrating and disconcerting things about it. And for me, this film shows yet again that there is something". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Smurfs review – Rihanna is star turn of the new generation of floppy-hatted blue elves The star vocal turn of the very moderate new Smurfs film is Rihanna, phoning in an undemanding audio contribution as the female character named “Smurfette”. But there is little to no music in this laborious slice of content, one of the many frustrating and disconcerting things about it. And for me, this film shows yet again that there is something
